#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,i,j,ans;
	vector<string >v;
	string s;
	scanf("%d ",&n);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>s;
		v.push_back(s);
	}
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	ans=0;
	for(i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		j=0;
		while(j<v[i].size() && v[i][j] == v[i-1][j])
			j++;
		if(ans<j)
			ans=j;
	}
	printf("%d",ans);
	return 0;
}
